title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 95.4 - Preliminary conference
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 95.4 - Preliminary conference

State Regulations

If the investigating officer shall determine after investigation that probable cause exists for crediting the allegations of the complaint, he shall by conference with the parties endeavor to accomplish a voluntary elimination of the unlawful discriminatory practice involved in the complaint. If the respondent voluntarily ceases and desists from the unlawful discriminatory practice, the commissioner shall issue an order terminating the proceeding upon such terms and conditions as he shall deem proper. Notes
